name: Sad Paddle
description:
Sad Paddle is a single player arcade satire and comedy game inspired by the Atari classic, Pong. Battle against yourself to beat your high score. Sad Paddle wants you to lose, so make it happy!

-Funny and addictive arcade gameplay

-Simulated real-world paddle and ball physics

-4 difficulty levels with speed and score modifiers

-Crisp rain, thunder, and lightning effects

-Sharp retro black and white graphics

-Personal high score tracking

-Performance enhancements

-No ads

-Infinity mode

-Extra ironic difficulty level

-Super classy piano music

-Flat paddle option for more retro gameplay

-Achievements

-Mood paddle modes

-Super party mode

Sad Paddle :( - Make It Happy :)

Made with Unity
